publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2405 Lewis Macdonald:The Draft Landfill Allowances Scheme ( Scotland) Regulations 2005—That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the draft Landfill Allowances Scheme ( Scotland) Regulations 2005 be approved. Supported by: Ross Finnie*

S2M-2405 Lewis Macdonald:The Draft Landfill Allowances Scheme ( Scotland) Regulations 2005—That the Environment and Rural Development Committee recommends that the draft Landfill Allowances Scheme ( Scotland) Regulations 2005 be approved. Supported by: Ross Finnie
